store.message.error.message: 找不到擴展程序, 正在鎖定功能...
store.message.error.description: Error message when the extension wasn't detected

store.message.success.message: 已搜尋到擴展程序, 正在解除鎖定功能...
store.message.success.description: Success message when the extension was detected

store.cards.verified.message: 此狀態已由經過驗證的開發人員批准

store.header.search.description: Search bar text when nothing is stated

store.card.presence.add.description: Button that will appear on hover after extension is installed.

store.card.presence.remove.description: Button that will appear on hover after extension and presence is installed.

store.card.presence.included.message: 在需要時會自動使用此狀態, 不需添加它。
store.card.presence.included.description: The message that appears instead of the buttons.
